So he/she do not need any job search function by skills.. for example a teached who mentioned that he is good in computer, math and sports... so he will get job related to these skills only... i will provide you the list)- Option to share profie on FB- View all available Jobs based on skills ONLY- Search available job bya. nearest location (within 5 km, within 10 km, entire city, entire state, specific city/state)b. Find job by their friends phone #- JobOnBench... this feature will come later...just one button with a popup comment- Option to apply for job with a pop up where he will confirm that he is allowing us to share his profile to employer- Push notification for new job posts related skills- Push notification from Admin for updates, profile related comments_____________In web:- Admin/Employer will longin from web- Admin will approve registered employer- No general email such as gmail,yahoo...etc allowed in employer- Employer profile management and option to post jobs- Admin will get option to approve job posts- Employer will get applications from candidates directly with phone number, photo and other details; on their email ID- One employer can post only 2 job in a day and it will be approved by admin- A one page dashboard for employer like indeed... to post job, view applications... rest details will go in their email- Admin will be able to see all the candidates who created their profile in App and option to modify, delete, accept, reject, notify candidate in message/push notification- integration on home page of the website
